name: shabdawali
description: Amazing human like typping effects with typo, events, dynamic speed and more

scripts.bundle: browserify src/shabdawali.js -s shabdawali > dist/shabdawali.js; browserify src/shabdawali.js -s shabdawali | uglifyjs --compress > dist/shabdawali.min.js

author: Amit Kumar Gupta
